List of Disabilities Under 38 CFR 3.309(d) for Which SC Is Presumed
The table below lists the disabilities for which SC is presumed based on a Veteran’s participation in a radiation-risk activity under
38 CFR 3.309(d)
.
PL or Federal Register Citation

thyroid
